question: What is the axis mobile wallet?
answer:
axis is a mobile wallet that is licensed by the Central Bank of Egypt. axis empowers people to get paid, send, spend & get rewarded -  all from their mobile phone. You don’t need a bank account or a minimum balance. All you need is a National ID. Using it is as simple as using a mobile phone.

It’s easy, instant, safe, and affordable.

question: What is the minimum age to sign up to axis?
answer: The minimum age is 16.

question: Do I need a bank account to use axis?
answer: No! All you need is a National ID.

question: What’s the maximum monthly spend limit from the axis mobile wallet?
What is the maximum daily spend limit from the axis mobile wallet?
How can I cash out?
answer: You can cash out from any ATM, Fawry branch, or axis branch.

question: How can I cash in?
answer: You can cash in from any ATM, Fawry branch, axis branch, or via Instapay.

question: Can I receive my salary on my axis mobile wallet?
answer: Yes you can! Leave your company details here so that we can make this happen.

question: What are the benefits of receiving my salary on an axis mobile wallet?
answer: If you receive your salary on the axis mobile wallet, you can ask for salary advances & get reimbursed for out of pocket expenses directly onto your axis mobile wallet. You can also earn points & cashback every time you spend by scanning any QR code to pay, or buying anything online with the virtual Visa card. You can send & receive money from any mobile wallet in Egypt.

question: Can I pay my bills using axis?
answer: Yes you can pay for a whole range of bills including mobile, internet, electricity, water, gas, landline, traffic, education, in addition to installments.

question: Can I send money to family and friends from my axis mobile wallet?
answer: Yes you can instantly send to any axis or non-axis mobile wallet (including Vodafone Cash, Etisalat Cash, Orange Cash, CIB wallet etc.)

question: How long does it take to send money?
answer: It’s instant!

question: Can I request money from someone?
answer: Yes! You can request money from any axis or non-axis mobile wallet.

question: Can I buy things online using the axis mobile wallet?
answer: Yes you can use the virtual Visa card to pay for anything from any website or you can scan a QR code online to pay.

question: Can I pay for online subscriptions using the axis mobile wallet?
answer: Yes you can use the virtual Visa card to pay for any online subscription.

question: How else can I pay for things?
answer: You can scan any QR code to pay for anything in-person or online

question: Does axis have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes! You earn points every time you spend with axis! You can redeem these points as cashback to spend using the axis mobile wallet, to cash out, or to donate to a charity of your choice.

question: Can I get deals from merchants using axis?
answer: Yes you can also enjoy discounts & cashback from our participating merchants.

question: How safe is it?
answer: axis is regulated by the Central Bank of Egypt and fully integrated on Meeza Digital and Visa. axis also has a partner bank to ensure that your money is secure.

question: Are my deposits insured?
answer: Yes, your entire money on the wallet is secured.

question: How can I reach axis customer service?
answer:
You can contact us on 15731 to ask any questions you may have about our products & services.
You can also email us on Support@axisapp.com
